sentences.en: Except traditional factors, nontraditional factors also had deep affect of East Asia integration development.
sentences.cn: 除了传统的合作领域外, 非传统合作因素对东亚经济也有深刻影响.

sentences.en: Nontraditional loans often start with low payments for the first year or two.
sentences.cn: 非传统贷款通常在前一两年还款额是较低的。

words.tran_cn: 不符合传统的，非传统的

trans.tran_cn: 非传统的，不符合传统的
